name: Time Changer (Jean Luca)
description:
Feedback Form 

If you wanna help the development, after playing you can answer this Form to give me some feedback about your experience with the game.

Description

Time Changer is a platform-puzzle, inspired by know titles like Portal and Antichamber, traverse a structure inspired in the optical art movement and work of Escher while you solve challenges and  surpass what seems unlikely paths.

In Time Changer you have the power to control the time of two objects at the same time. 
Accelerate and decelerate objects and interact with the other mechanics  to create paths to new rooms.

The game is currently in development, some of the aspects are not implemented yet and almost all the art is placeholder.

Controls
  •   Moves the Character.
  •  Aim.
  •  Slow the target object | Throw object when carrying.
  •  Accelerate the target object.
  •  Interact/Carry object.
  •  Pause menu.
